20110128140106.000|20110128140109.333|TR0|Moscow.
20110128140109.333|20110128140112.667|TR0|
20110128140112.667|20110128140116.000|TR0|President Dmitry Medvedev signed
20110128140116.000|20110128140119.333|TR0|the START ratification document
20110128140119.333|20110128140122.667|TR0|on Friday - the last step in a
20110128140122.667|20110128140126.000|TR0|lengthy process involving both
20110128140126.000|20110128140128.500|TR0|sides.

20110128140256.000|20110128140259.333|TR0|Moscow. Russia's Parliament is

20110128140316.000|20110128140319.333|TR0|President Dmitry Medvedev has
20110128140319.333|20110128140322.667|TR0|already fired several officials
20110128140322.667|20110128140326.000|TR0|over security lapses which
20110128140326.000|20110128140329.333|TR0|allowed the tragedy to happen.
20110128140329.333|20110128140332.667|TR0|
20110128140332.667|20110128140336.000|TR0|RT's Irina Galushko has more
20110128140336.000|20110128140339.333|TR0|from inside the State Duma.
20110128140339.333|20110128140342.667|TR0|
20110128140342.667|20110128140346.000|TR0|Just look, how much we needed
20110128140346.000|20110128140348.500|TR0|this system in light of the
20110128140348.500|20110128140351.000|TR0|Domodedovo attack. Now they are
20110128140351.000|20110128140353.500|TR0|trying to find the culprits, and
20110128140353.500|20110128140356.000|TR0|they will find them, and the
20110128140356.000|20110128140359.333|TR0|culprits will be punished, some
20110128140359.333|20110128140402.667|TR0|have already been punished. But
20110128140402.667|20110128140406.000|TR0|what everyone is saying is that
20110128140406.000|20110128140409.333|TR0|there was no relevant
20110128140409.333|20110128140412.667|TR0|information. And now according

20110128140416.000|20110128140418.500|TR0|informed about the threats it's
20110128140418.500|20110128140421.000|TR0|facing.
20110128140421.000|20110128140423.500|TR0|

20110128140426.000|20110128140429.333|TR0|friends usually pray five times

20110128140928.500|20110128140931.000|TR0|Tens of thousands of angry
20110128140931.000|20110128140933.500|TR0|protesters have continued to
20110128140933.500|20110128140936.000|TR0|clash with police in Cairo on
20110128140936.000|20110128140939.333|TR0|the third day of violence there.
20110128140939.333|20110128140942.667|TR0|It comes as internet access all
20110128140942.667|20110128140946.000|TR0|across Egypt is completely shut
20110128140946.000|20110128140949.333|TR0|down and mobile phone services
20110128140949.333|20110128140952.667|TR0|are reportedly off in some
20110128140952.667|20110128140956.000|TR0|regions.
20110128140956.000|20110128140959.333|TR0|
20110128140959.333|20110128141002.667|TR0|At least seven people have been
20110128141002.667|20110128141006.000|TR0|killed during the turmoil.
20110128141006.000|20110128141008.500|TR0|
20110128141008.500|20110128141011.000|TR0|It was inspired by the
20110128141011.000|20110128141013.500|TR0|month-long chaos in Tunisia,
20110128141013.500|20110128141016.000|TR0|where uprisings saw its leader
20110128141016.000|20110128141019.333|TR0|deposed, 80 dead, and a cabinet
20110128141019.333|20110128141022.667|TR0|reshuffle.
20110128141022.667|20110128141026.000|TR0|
20110128141026.000|20110128141029.333|TR0|As RT's Aleksey Yaroshevskiy
20110128141029.333|20110128141032.667|TR0|reports, the images of angry
20110128141032.667|20110128141036.000|TR0|protests in North Africa bear
20110128141036.000|20110128141038.500|TR0|some striking parallels with
20110128141038.500|20110128141041.000|TR0|elsewhere...
20110128141041.000|20110128141043.500|TR0|
20110128141043.500|20110128141046.000|TR0|Georgia 2003  Ukraine
20110128141046.000|20110128141049.333|TR0|2004Kyrgyzstan 2005 .. and
20110128141049.333|20110128141052.667|TR0|Egypt 2011.
20110128141052.667|20110128141056.000|TR0|
20110128141056.000|20110128141059.333|TR0|Think these are all completely
20110128141059.333|20110128141102.667|TR0|different revolts? Well, think
20110128141102.667|20110128141106.000|TR0|again. And not only because a
20110128141106.000|20110128141108.500|TR0|raised fist was one of their
20110128141108.500|20110128141111.000|TR0|symbols.
20110128141111.000|20110128141113.500|TR0|
20110128141113.500|20110128141116.000|TR0|SOT - William Enghdal, writer
20110128141116.000|20110128141119.333|TR0|(ENG)
20110128141119.333|20110128141122.667|TR0|
20110128141122.667|20110128141126.000|TR0|If you look more closely, you
20110128141126.000|20110128141129.333|TR0|look at the so-called people who
20110128141129.333|20110128141132.667|TR0|are leading this, are being
20110128141132.667|20110128141136.000|TR0|coached. And they're being
20110128141136.000|20110128141139.333|TR0|coached by the U.S. Intelligence
20110128141139.333|20110128141142.667|TR0|Services, the same way the
20110128141142.667|20110128141146.000|TR0|Orange revolution was in Ukraine
20110128141146.000|20110128141148.500|TR0|or the Rose Revolution with
20110128141148.500|20110128141151.000|TR0|Saakashvili in Georgia.
20110128141151.000|20110128141153.500|TR0|
20110128141153.500|20110128141156.000|TR0|A string of revolutions - some
20110128141156.000|20110128141159.333|TR0|bloodless, some not - rocked the
20110128141159.333|20110128141202.667|TR0|post-soviet space at the
20110128141202.667|20110128141206.000|TR0|beginning of the 21st century.
20110128141206.000|20110128141209.333|TR0|There were a number of common
20110128141209.333|20110128141212.667|TR0|factors - an uprising against
20110128141212.667|20110128141216.000|TR0|the regime, rooted in a popular
20110128141216.000|20110128141218.500|TR0|dissatisfaction with standards
20110128141218.500|20110128141221.000|TR0|of living. Hence the collective
20110128141221.000|20110128141223.500|TR0|name - colored revolutions.
20110128141223.500|20110128141226.000|TR0|Amazingly, their outcomes have
20110128141226.000|20110128141229.333|TR0|been quite similar too.
20110128141229.333|20110128141232.667|TR0|
20110128141232.667|20110128141236.000|TR0|STANDUP In 2006 - IT WAS 2004!!!
20110128141236.000|20110128141239.333|TR0|- , Kievs independence square
20110128141239.333|20110128141242.667|TR0|was the birthplace of the Orange
20110128141242.667|20110128141246.000|TR0|revolution. It promised a new
20110128141246.000|20110128141249.333|TR0|dawn and major changes for the
20110128141249.333|20110128141252.667|TR0|country, but ultimately all
20110128141252.667|20110128141256.000|TR0|aspirations came to nothing.
20110128141256.000|20110128141258.500|TR0|
20110128141258.500|20110128141301.000|TR0|Lawyer Grigoriy Sitenko is one
20110128141301.000|20110128141303.500|TR0|of those disenchanted with the
20110128141303.500|20110128141306.000|TR0|outcome of the Orange makeover.
20110128141306.000|20110128141309.333|TR0|He says the bright promises of
20110128141309.333|20110128141312.667|TR0|the revolutions leaders have in
20110128141312.667|20110128141316.000|TR0|reality pushed the country into
20110128141316.000|20110128141319.333|TR0|an abyss.
20110128141319.333|20110128141322.667|TR0|
20110128141322.667|20110128141326.000|TR0|SOT - Grigoriy Sitenko (ENG)
20110128141326.000|20110128141328.500|TR0|Poverty and corruption
20110128141328.500|20110128141331.000|TR0|increased, the country is now
20110128141331.000|20110128141333.500|TR0|divided by ideological issues.
20110128141333.500|20110128141336.000|TR0|Nothing changed for the better,
20110128141336.000|20110128141339.333|TR0|only for the worse. Viktor
20110128141339.333|20110128141342.667|TR0|Yushenko - the revolutionary
20110128141342.667|20110128141346.000|TR0|hero - got only 5 percent of the
20110128141346.000|20110128141349.333|TR0|votes at the presidential
20110128141349.333|20110128141352.667|TR0|election. The lowest result for
20110128141352.667|20110128141356.000|TR0|an acting president in the world.
20110128141356.000|20110128141359.333|TR0|
20110128141359.333|20110128141402.667|TR0|It was a similar story in
20110128141402.667|20110128141406.000|TR0|Georgia, where the heady
20110128141406.000|20110128141408.500|TR0|optimism of the Rose revolution
20110128141408.500|20110128141411.000|TR0|soon gave way to disappointment
20110128141411.000|20110128141413.500|TR0|- and eventually to mass
20110128141413.500|20110128141416.000|TR0|protests.
20110128141416.000|20110128141419.333|TR0|
20110128141419.333|20110128141422.667|TR0|Their anger with President
20110128141422.667|20110128141426.000|TR0|Saakashvili was met with a
20110128141426.000|20110128141429.333|TR0|response that was all too
20110128141429.333|20110128141432.667|TR0|familiar - as gas grenades and
20110128141432.667|20110128141436.000|TR0|water cannons were used to quell
20110128141436.000|20110128141438.500|TR0|the unrest.
20110128141438.500|20110128141441.000|TR0|
